QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT distinct chu.person_id as PersonId, case when neoplasm_characteristic = histology_characteristic then regexp_replace (trim (coalesce (histology_characteristic, '')||' '||coalesce (direction, '')||' '|| coalesce (neoplasm_type, '')||' '|| coalesce (histology, '')), ' +',' ') else regexp_replace (trim (coalesce (neoplasm_characteristic, '') ||' '|| coalesce (histology_characteristic, '')||' '||coalesce (direction, '')||' '|| coalesce (neoplasm_type, '')||' ' || coalesce (histology, 'neoplasm')), ' +',' ') end as source_concept_name, case when lower(h.neoplasm_dx_date_type) = 'exact' then to_date(h.neoplasm_dx_date, 'YYYYMMDD') when left(h.neoplasm_dx_date, 4) != 'yyyy' and right(h.neoplasm_dx_date, 4) = 'mmdd' and DATE_PART(year, h.note_date) = left(h.neoplasm_dx_date, 4) then h.note_date when left(h.neoplasm_dx_date, 4) != 'yyyy' and right(h.neoplasm_dx_date, 4) = 'mmdd' then to_date(replace(h.neoplasm_dx_date, 'mmdd', '0630'), 'YYYYMMDD') when left(h.neoplasm_dx_date, 4) != 'yyyy' and right(h.neoplasm_dx_date, 2) = 'dd' and DATE_PART(year, h.note_date) || DATE_PART(month, h.note_date) = left(h.neoplasm_dx_date, 6) then h.note_date when left(h.neoplasm_dx_date, 4) != 'yyyy' and right(h.neoplasm_dx_date, 2) = 'dd' then to_date(replace(h.neoplasm_dx_date, 'dd', '15'), 'YYYYMMDD') else h.note_date end as date, h.neoplasm_histology_key FROM {sc}.onc_neoplasm_histology h JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks chu ON chu.ChunkId = {0} AND h.ptid = chu.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE left join {sc}.onc_characteristic ch on h.neoplasm_histology_key= ch.neoplasm_histology_key And (ch.neoplasm_char_temporal_status ='current' OR ch.histology_char_temporal_status ='current') and (ch.neoplasm_characteristic in ('in situ','malignant', 'benign') or ch.histology_characteristic in ('in situ', 'malignant', 'benign') ) where (h.neoplasm_temporal_status ='current' OR h.histology_temporal_status ='current') AND (h.neoplasm_qualifier ='actual' OR h.histology_qualifier ='actual') order by 1
